com.att.research.xacml.std.pip.engines.ldap

Interface LDAPResolver

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurableResolver
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurableLDAPResolver

    public interface LDAPResolver
extends ConfigurableResolver
    LDAPResolver is the interface used by the LDAPEngine to convert a request for a XACML attribute into an LDAP query string, including retrieving any required attributes needed to construct the query string, and convert the response into a collection of Attributes.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    car

    • Method Detail

      • getBase

        java.lang.String getBase(PIPEngine pipEngine,
                       PIPRequest pipRequest,
                       PIPFinder pipFinder)
                         throws PIPException
        Gets the base String to be used in the search method of a javax.naming.directory.DirectoryContext.
        Parameters:
        pipEngine - the PIPEngine making the request
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest to convert
        pipFinder - the PIPFinder to use when resolving required attributes
        Returns:
        the base String or null if the PIPRequest cannot be satisfied by this LDAPResolver
        Throws:
        PIPException

      • getFilterString

        java.lang.String getFilterString(PIPEngine pipEngine,
                               PIPRequest pipRequest,
                               PIPFinder pipFinder)
                                 throws PIPException
        Converts the given PIPRequest into an LDAP filter string to use in the search method of a javax.naming.directory.DirectoryContext.
        Parameters:
        pipEngine - the PIPEngine making the request
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest to convert
        pipFinder - the PIPFinder to use when resolving required attributes
        Returns:
        the filter string to use or null if the given PIPRequest cannot be satisfied by this LDAPResolver
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error retrieving any required attributes

      • decodeResult

        java.util.List<Attribute> decodeResult(javax.naming.directory.SearchResult searchResult)
                                       throws PIPException
        Converts a SearchResult into a List of Attributes.
        Parameters:
        searchResult - the SearchResult to convert
        Returns:
        a List of Attributes or null if the SearchResult connot be converted.
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error decoding the SearchResult
